sentences.en: " I do not like for him to waken me.
sentences.cn: “ 我不愿让船主人来叫醒我.

sentences.en: "Drink this coffee — it will waken you up."
sentences.cn: “把这杯咖啡喝了——它会让你清醒过来。”

sentences.en: Chinese manufacturers have waken up to the strength of media promotion.
sentences.cn: 中国制造商已经认识到媒介促销的力量.

sentences.en: I feel as if I had waken from a nightmare.
sentences.cn: 我觉得好像刚从噩梦中醒来.
到时候我去喊醒你得啦.

sentences.en: If you do waken up during the night, start the exercises again.
sentences.cn: 如果你夜里真的醒了，就再从头开始做这套动作。

sentences.en: It looks as if he have just waken up.
Naomi would waken to the twitter of birds.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米会被鸟儿吱吱喳喳的叫声唤醒。

sentences.en: Raises and sits on the bed, Cindy is waken up too.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔被吓醒了,在床上坐了起来.

sentences.en: Responsibility can inspire a person's potential and waken conscience as well.
sentences.cn: 责任能激发人的潜能,也能唤醒人的良知.

sentences.en: She gently wakened the sleeping child.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地唤醒睡梦中的孩子。

sentences.en: The cat has been waken up with a start.
The wind lulled as if it feared to waken them.
sentences.cn: 风势渐渐平息下去,仿佛唯恐吵醒她们似的.

sentences.en: When would you like to be waken up, sir?
sentences.cn: 先生, 您想要在什么时候被叫醒?

sentences.en: Women are much more likely than men to waken because of noise.
sentences.cn: 较之男性,女性更可能被噪音吵醒.

words.tran_cn: 醒来，唤醒；唤起（记忆）（wake的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_en: to wake up, or to wake someone up
